name: Escape (itch) (itsohclay)
description:
This game is for  the Gam Jame#15

 

Theme:  No Going Back

 

Special Object: Door

 

Description: Your goal is to escape the maze and by doing that, you have to grab the key to unlock the door. Then you will be free.

 

Controls: The catch is that you can't move in the opposite direction that you are going. Arrow Keys - to move   Note: I only had time to make one level
